experience.name: experience
experience.description: The amount of experience the character has gained

health.name: health
health.description: The amount of damage the character can take before dying

attack.name: attack
attack.description: Influences the amount of damage the character can deal with physical attacks

defence.name: defence
defence.description: Influences the amount of damage the character takes from physical attacks

magic.name: magic
magic.description: Influences the amount of damage the character deals and takes from magical attacks

agility.name: agility
agility.description: Influence how frequently the character attacks, how likely the character is to land an attack, and how likely the character is to dodge an attack
